SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
How Independent Software Vendors Configure Disclosures

Independent software vendors (ISVs) can create questions in Discovery Framework and configure a guided process in Omnistudio to store responses and generate disclosures.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions


PERMISSION SET NEEDED
To create questionnaire and Omnistudio form:	Omnistudio Admin
To create packages:	Create AppExchange Packages

Here's an image that shows the high-level steps how the ISVs configure disclosures.

Configure interest tags to manage commonly used responses or clauses in a central location for easy search and associations. See Configure Interest Tags to Tag your Disclosure Questions and Responses.
Define questions, question sets, and use them to form questionnaires in Discovery Framework. See Manage Disclosure Questionnaire Information Using Discovery Framework.
Define the general flow of how data is collected through questionnaires using Omnistudio. See Omnistudio. Map quantitative responses from records in your org using Omnistudio Data Mappers and integration procedures. See Omnistudio Integration Procedures.
Define the structure, content, and format of generated disclosure documents. See Define Disclosure Document Generation.
Set up disclosure metadata to bind the common components and the Omniscript that must be launched. See Set Up Disclosure Metadata.
Package disclosure questions, flows, and disclosure metadata to distribute to users. See Package the Disclosures for Distribution.
Package the Disclosures for Distribution
You can package your disclosures to distribute to other Salesforce users and organizations, including those outside your company.
